Include proper TypeScript interfaces and make it accessible. Validate it follows shadcn/ui patterns. This is a straightforward creation task with known steps, so use complexity="basic" when beginning.

input.query: shadcn ui components button card input patterns

content.content:
1â†’
     2â†’import * as React from "react"
     3â†’import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     4â†’import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     5â†’import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     6â†’const buttonVariants = cva(
     7â†’  "inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50",
     8â†’  {
     9â†’    variants: {
    10â†’      variant: {
    11â†’        default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
    12â†’        destructive:
    13â†’          "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90",
    14â†’        outline:
    15â†’          "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    16â†’        secondary:
    17â†’          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
    18â†’        ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    19â†’        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
    20â†’      },
    21â†’      size: {
    22â†’        default: "h-10 px-4 py-2",
    23â†’        sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3",
    24â†’        lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8",
    25â†’        icon: "h-10 w-10",
    26â†’      },
    27â†’    },
    28â†’    defaultVariants: {
    29â†’      variant: "default",
    30â†’      size: "default",
    31â†’    },
    32â†’  }
    33â†’)
    34â†’export interface ButtonProps
    35â†’  extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
    36â†’    VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {
    37â†’  asChild?: boolean
    38â†’}
    39â†’const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
    40â†’  ({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => {
    41â†’    const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    42â†’    return (
    43â†’      <Comp
    44â†’        className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    45â†’        ref={ref}
    46â†’        {...props}
    47â†’      />
    48â†’    )
    49â†’  }
    50â†’)
    51â†’Button.displayName = "Button"
    52â†’export { Button, buttonVariants }
    53â†’
